 = Introduction =
Publish the data of the house to internet.

 = Function =
 * Publish the data of the house to internet.

 = Hardware Required =
 * Arduino Ethernet Shield
 * Shield-compatible Arduino board
 * Network cable to connect the sheild and the router
 * USB cable to connect Arduino and PC (optional, just for debug)

 = Software Required =
 * Arduino 1.o or newer
 * Pachube account
 * Pachube feed

 = Library Required =
 * WString
 * Ethernet
 * SPI
 * ERxPachube
